summary_md: The Slovak Republic, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 19,798 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.76% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 5.23% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 78.02 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 89.80% percent (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's GDP growth rate is 85.22% percent (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
